name: frappe
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a partly frozen drink or a drink made with a lot of ice, containing milk, fruit juice, or alcohol: a chocolate/strawberry frappé She asked the waiter for another creme de menthe frappe.
asikkk/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
(also frappé coffee) a cold coffee drink made from coffee shaken with ice, originally from Greece: A frappé is traditionally made with instant coffee.
More examplesFewer examplesHe asked the waiter to bring him a mango frappé.I had fish with a rocket salad and a fruit frappé for dessert.We cooled off with a frappe made with vanilla ice cream.We stopped for a frappé with lots of milk and sugar at a small cafe in the hills.For breakfast, I'd like a bowl of Greek yoghurt with fresh fruit, and a strong frappe.
